trans-unit.source: Defines the writer, resource, print ticket, and package relationship settings that are associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Определяет объект записи, ресурс, билет печати и параметры связи пакета для заданного <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> class for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> для заданного <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document that the packaging policy applies to.
trans-unit.target: Документ [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)], к которому относится политика упаковки.

trans-unit.source: The order in which to interleave document elements.
trans-unit.target: Порядок следования элементов документа в потоке.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> class with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> and specified interleave order.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> заданным <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> и заданным значением порядка элементов в потоке.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the color context.
Acquires the resource stream for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает поток ресурса для заданного объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> that has the specified <paramref name="resourceId" />.
trans-unit.target: Поток ресурса для объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> с заданным идентификатором <paramref name="resourceId" />.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the resource stream for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
The resource stream for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
The identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font.
Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
The resource stream for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font that has the specified <paramref name="resourceId" />.
trans-unit.target: Поток ресурса для шрифта [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] с заданным <paramref name="resourceId" />.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] image.
Acquires the resource stream for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает поток ресурса для заданного объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" />.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> that has the specified <paramref name="resourceId" />.
trans-unit.target: Поток ресурса для объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> с заданным идентификатором <paramref name="resourceId" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the resource dictionary.
Acquires the resource stream for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает поток ресурса для заданного объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] resource stream for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> that has the specified <paramref name="resourceId" />.
trans-unit.target: Поток ресурса [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] для объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> с заданным идентификатором <paramref name="resourceId" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets" /> for the current page content.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает список <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets" /> для содержимого текущей страницы.

trans-unit.source: The list of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets" /> for the current page content.
Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает объект <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> для текущего объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает объект <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> для текущего объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает объект <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> для текущего объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current page.
trans-unit.target: Выполняет получение <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> для текущей станицы.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает объект <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> для текущего объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed document.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed document.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed page.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed page.

Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> is added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
The print ticket to store as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Билет печати, сохраняемый как часть документа [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Stores a specified <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> as part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Этот метод не проверить или изменить указанный `printTicket` для какого-либо <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: При необходимости используйте <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> метод для создания <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> относится к <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> и недопустим для указанного принтера.

trans-unit.source: Prepares to commit the current page to the output store.
trans-unit.target: Выполняет подготовку к сохранению текущей страницы во внешнем хранилище.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource to associate with the current page.
The identifying name of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> that associates the current page with the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Идентифицирующее имя объекта <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" />, связывающего текущую страницу с заданным ресурсом.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> with a specified name that associates a specified resource with the current page.
trans-unit.target: Добавляет <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> с заданным именем, связывающий заданный ресурс с текущей страницей.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the restricted font to associate with the current document.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], шрифта с ограниченным доступом, связываемого с текущим документом.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> that associates a restricted font with the current document.
trans-unit.target: Добавляет <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" />, связывающий шрифт с ограниченным доступом с текущим документом.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" />.
Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
The identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font that you want to release.
Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" />.
Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
Releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Освобождает поток <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> для текущего объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Освобождает поток <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> для текущего объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Освобождает поток <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> для текущего объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
